original_title: 兄カノ。～禁断の恋 さくらゆら
overview: Mika Naito's original, popular comic novel that recorded 120,000 downloads is visualized with the handsome actor "Yoshihiko Arima", the popular actor "Jun Odagiri" and the kawaii * exclusive "Sakura Yura"! Shooting is also an R18 work for girls who are particular about pounding and squeaking, gathering only female staff. One day in front of Hinata (Sakura) and her lover Yuto (Odagiri), her younger brother Shota (Arima) suddenly appears, and Hinata shakes her heart between her brothers.
title: ANIKANO: Forbidden Love....
